select if(max(id) is null, 1, max(id) + 1) as newId from sku_list
insert into sku_list(id, price, weight, category3Id, tmId, spuId, skuName, skuDesc, skuDefaultImage, isSale, createTime) values(#{id}, #{price}, #{weight}, #{category3Id}, #{tmId}, #{spuId}, #{skuName}, #{skuDesc}, #{skuDefaultImage}, #{isSale}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select s.*, i.id as iid, i.spuImageId, i.isDefault, i.imageName, i.imageUrl, sa.id as said, sa.saleAttrValueId, sa.saleAttrValueName, sa.saleAttrKeyId, sa.saleAttrKeyName, a.id as aid, a.attrKeyId, a.attrKeyName, a.attrValueId, a.attrValueName from sku_list s left outer join sku_image i on (s.id = i.skuId) left outer join sku_sale_attr_value sa on (s.id = sa.skuId) left outer join sku_attr_value a on (s.id = a.skuId) where s.id = #{skuId}

select category3Id from sku_list where skuName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') and isSale = 1 group by category3Id having count(*) >=all (select count(*) from sku_list where skuName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') and isSale = 1 group by category3Id) limit 0,1
